page.title: 16GAMES
page.content: We play quite a lot of games but the the most common game is football even the girls play. At school we play cricket, rounders,British bulldogs and many other things. We also play dodge ball which is very good and mini volley ball. The girls play netball or badminton. At nights we play on our bikes. Football is a team game.You cannot touch the ball except for the goalkeeper.The object of the game is to put the ball at the back of the net. Cricket is easy. There is a bowler, batters and fielders. The batters have to hit the ball with a bat. You can be caught out or stumped out or even L.B.W. which means leg before wicket . A fielder gets the ball and throws it back so that his team can get the batters out.
